html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-02682024-03-25TBS
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectAppointment of Auditors and the Auditor General of Canada as Joint Auditor of the Wholly-Owned Subsidiaries of the Public Sector Pension Investment Board
PrecisOrder appointing (1) an AUDITOR for each of the wholly-owned SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2024; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR for each of the wholly-owned SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Order appointing (1) an AUDITOR for each of the wholly-owned SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2024; and (2) the AUDITOR GENERAL OF CANADA as JOINT AUDITOR for each of the wholly-owned SUBSIDIARIES of the PUBLIC SECTOR PENSION INVESTMENT BOARD for the fiscal year that ends during the period beginning on January 1, 2023 and ending on March 31, 2024.
